programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: All Quiet on the Montecito Front

programme.title: Profundo Azul 2 - O Recife
programme.desc: Sebastian e Dani são contratados como mergulhadores para procurar um tesouro perdido do tempo de Colombo. Mas os duvidosos clientes, Azra e Carlton, têm um plano secreto e Sebastian e Dani correm perigo, num derradeiro teste às suas técnicas de mergulho, bem como ao seu amor e vontade de viver.

programme.title: Operação Especial
programme.desc: Na Nigéria, no seguimento de um golpe de Estado, um grupo de soldados de elite americanos escoltam na selva uma médica e aldeãos ameaçados pelos rebeldes.

programme.title: Fama
programme.desc: Numa incrível atmosfera competitiva, a paixão de cada estudante vai ser posta em causa. Para além dos objetivos artísticos, têm de lidar com as questões normais da escola secundária, uma fase tumultuosa cheia de trabalhos, amizades intensas, despertar das paixões e autodescoberta.

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: Uma história de amor que se desdobra em múltiplas linhas temporais, ao longo de 500 anos. As personagens conhecem-se, separam-se e voltam a reunir-se de uma vida para a próxima. As ações e escolhas individuais têm consequências e impactos entre si no passado, presente e futuro.

programme.title: Um Perfeito Estranho
programme.desc: Quando a jornalista Rowena Price descobre que o homicídio da sua amiga pode estar relacionado com o poderoso executivo Harrison Hill, infiltra-se numa grande companhia publicitária com o intuito de o desmascarar.

programme.title: Dragões Americanos
programme.desc: Tony Luca é um detetive nova-iorquino que sem querer estraga o seu disfarce durante uma investigação à mafia. Este erro resulta numa transferência para o departamento de homicídios e o seu parceiro passa a ser Kim, da polícia de Seul. Inicialmente distantes, acabam por se tornar inseparáveis.

programme.title: Árctico
programme.desc: Um homem perdido no meio do Ártico, depois de um desastre de avião, terá de decidir se deverá permanecer no seu relativamente seguro abrigo improvisado, ou embarcar numa viagem através do desconhecido que lhe poderá custar a vida.

programme.title: Retroactive
programme.desc: Karen tem um acidente no deserto do Texas e é ajudada por Frank. Quando este descobre que a esposa lhe é infiel, mata-a. Karen foge e encontra um laboratório com uma máquina do tempo que é ativada, fazendo com que recue 20 minutos. Karen utiliza esse tempo para tentar impedir o homicídio.

programme.title: A Comuna
programme.desc: Nos anos 70, o casal Erik e Anna realiza um sonho e, juntamente com a filha, monta uma comuna em Copenhaga. Há amizade, amor e vida em conjunto debaixo do mesmo teto, até que um devastador caso de amor sujeita a comuna ao seu maior teste.

programme.title: Mamã
programme.desc: Uma mãe solteira tenta sustentar-se a si e ao filho, de 15 anos, que sofre de Perturbação de Hiperatividade e Défice de Atenção. Quando a nova e peculiar vizinha se oferece para a ajudar, encontram um novo sentido de equilíbrio e esperança.

programme.title: Climax
programme.desc: Passado em 1996, e inspirado em eventos reais, o último filme do provocador Gaspar Noé atira-nos para a loucura malévola que envolve um grupo de dançarinos após uma taça de sangria ser misturada com LSD.

programme.title: Vai Seguir-te
programme.desc: Jay tem 19 anos e depois de um encontro sexual, aparentemente inocente, vê-se atormentada por estranhas visões e pela terrível sensação de que algo está a segui-la. Jay e os amigos têm de encontrar forma de escapar aos horrores que estão no seu encalço.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Cook (role=Jennifer Jareau), Joe Mantegna (role=David Rossi), Thomas Gibson (role=Aaron Hotchner), Shemar Moore (role=Derek Morgan), Paget Brewster (role=Emily Prentiss), Aisha Tyler (role=Dr. Tara Lewis), Adam Rodriguez (role=Luke Alvez), Daniel Henney (role=Matt Simmons), Jeanne Tripplehorn (role=Alex Blake), Mandy Patinkin (role=Jason Gideon)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Cook"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1471491/","name":"Jeff Davis"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Criminal Minds: Drive","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2969812249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Criminal Minds: Drive"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: O Dossier Pelicano
programme.desc: Dois juízes do Supremo Tribunal foram assassinados e uma estudante de Direito exprime as suas suspeitas sobre as mortes num dossier especulativo. Ela e um decidido repórter de investigação querem dar a conhecer aquilo que descobriram, se viverem até poder fazê-lo.

programme.title: Código de Honra
programme.desc: Quando a sua família é assassinada num tiroteio, o coronel Sikes promete livrar a cidade de todos os criminosos! Começa uma violenta demanda, que o transforma num dos homens mais procurados. Porter, o seu antigo protegido, procura-o, a fim de o levar à justiça e de o travar de uma vez por todas!

programme.title: Rush - Duelo de Rivais
programme.desc: Durante a época dourada das corridas de Fórmula 1, dois corredores são aclamados como os melhores: o talentoso e playboy James Hunt e o seu metódico rival, Niki Lauda. À medida que os dois se provocam dentro e fora das pistas, chegam aos limites da sua resistência, e não há atalhos para a vitória!

The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Lutador - A Lei das Ruas
programme.desc: Mal chega de uma pequena cidade de província, Shawn MacArthur recorre ao contrabando ilegal de mercadorias para sobreviver em Nova Iorque. O jovem acaba por se envolver no submundo das lutas de rua, onde ascende à condição de estrela, derrotando vários lutadores.

programme.title: Dredd
programme.desc: Numa cidade violenta e futurista, Dredd é o derradeiro juiz e está determinado a salvar a cidade do seu mais recente flagelo: uma perigosa droga, que permite aos seus utilizadores experimentarem a realidade numa fração da sua velocidade normal.

programme.title: Dois Tiros
programme.desc: Bobby Trench, agente da DEA, e Marcus Stigman, um oficial da Marinha, são dois agentes duplos numa missão que envolve uma das mais implacáveis máfias mexicanas. Nenhum deles sabe a verdadeira identidade do companheiro, uma vez que um dos objetivos é vigiar e investigar os movimentos do outro.

programme.title: A Promessa de uma Vida
programme.desc: Uma aventura épica que decorre quatro anos após a devastadora batalha de Galípoli, na Turquia, durante a Primeira Guerra Mundial. Connor, um agricultor australiano, viaja para Istambul para descobrir o destino dos seus filhos, desaparecidos em combate.

programme.title: Olha Quem Fala Agora!
programme.desc: Em casa dos Ubriacco vivem-se dias agitados. James trabalha como piloto privado de uma multimilionária e Mollie tenta conciliar os deveres de mãe com um novo trabalho. Quando James adota um rafeiro e a patroa deste deixa a sua cadela sofisticada aos cuidados da família, as confusões sucedem-se.

programme.title: Jack e Jill
programme.desc: Jack é um publicitário de sucesso em L.A., com uma bela esposa e filhos, que receia todos os anos o mesmo evento: a visita da irmã gémea no dia de Ação de Graças. A necessitada e passivo-agressiva Jill enlouquece Jack, virando a sua vida do avesso.

Em 1946, Branch Rickey, dono dos Brooklin Dodgers, fez uma das jogadas mais arriscadas na Liga de Basebol Americana, ao contratar para a sua equipa Jackie Robinson. O contrato arrastou ambos para um mundo de críticas vindas do público, da imprensa e até mesmo dos outros jogadores.

programme.title: O Grande Peixe
programme.desc: Ed sai da sua pequena cidade natal, no Alabama, para dar a volta ao mundo. Já velho, diverte-se a contar as aventuras que viveu nessa altura, misturando realidade e fantasia. No entanto, as suas histórias fascinam todos... menos o filho, o que faz com que Ed tenha de separar a ficção da realidade.

programme.title: Um Ano Muito Violento
programme.desc: Em Nova Iorque, o inverno de 1981 foi, estatisticamente, o ano mais perigoso na história da cidade. Neste contexto, um casal procura manter o seu negócio por entre o labirinto político e corrupção industrial das ruas de uma cidade em decadência.

programme.title: Terra Chama Echo
programme.desc: Um grupo de amigos começa a receber mensagens estranhas nos telemóveis, mas os pais e as autoridades não dão importância a essas frases codificadas. Por sua conta e risco, os jovens embarcam numa aventura e descobrem um extraterrestre que precisa da sua ajuda.

programme.title: Os Irmãos Sisters
programme.desc: No velho oeste, dois irmãos, Charlie e Eli Sisters, são contratados para matar um prospetor de ouro. Começa assim uma implacável caçada, mas também uma jornada que irá testar os laços entre os dois irmãos.

programme.title: Bleed For This - A Força de um Campeão
programme.desc: A incrível história verídica do campeão mundial de boxe Vinny Pazienza. Na sequência de um grave acidente, quase fatal, ficou com a coluna fraturada e sem esperanças de voltar a andar. Mas, contra todas as probabilidades e recomendações médicas, ele recomeça a treinar...

programme.title: O Novo Mundo
programme.desc: Em 1607, John Smith, um explorador inglês tomado como refém na Virgínia pelos índios, apaixona-se por Pocahontas, uma das princesas da tribo.

programme.title: O Cavalheiro Com Arma
programme.desc: Inspirado na história verídica de Forrest Tucker, considerado o ladrão mais simpático de sempre. Forrest escapou audaciosamente da prisão de San Quentin aos 70 anos e fez uma série de assaltos que baralharam as autoridades e encantaram o público.

programme.title: A Máquina do Tempo
programme.desc: O cientista e inventor Alexander Hartdegen quer demonstrar que é possível viajar no tempo, construindo uma máquina para esse efeito. Alexander pretende voltar ao passado, mais concretamente à altura em que uma tragédia pessoal o deixou desolado, mas acaba por ser enviado para um futuro distante.

programme.title: O Jardim da Esperança
programme.desc: A história verídica de uma mulher que salvou centenas de vidas, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial. A gerir com o marido o zoo de Varsóvia, os dois colaboram com a Resistência e resgatam pessoas do Gueto de Varsóvia, colocando-se em risco, bem como a tudo o que construíram.

programme.title: Eu, Tonya
programme.desc: A história de como Tonya Harding, uma patinadora artística americana, viu o seu futuro desportivo em risco, quando se viu envolvida num violento ataque à sua rival, Nancy Kerrigan. Um retrato absurdo, trágico e hilariante.

programme.title: Dois é uma Família
programme.desc: Samuel vive uma vida sem responsabilidades, quando se vê com uma filha bebé nos braços para cuidar. Oito anos mais tarde, os dois são inseparáveis, até que a mãe da criança vem quebrar esta harmonia, quando resolve reaparecer para recuperar a filha.

programme.title: Um Homem No Limite
programme.desc: Nick Cassidy era um polícia honesto, que foi preso por um crime que cometeu. Desesperado, consegue fugir e sobe a um arranha-céus, ameaçando atirar-se dali...

programme.title: Vingança Sem Rosto
programme.desc: Um cientista vê mais do que devia e é vítima disso, ficando com o corpo todo queimado. Entretanto, resolve implantar em si a pele artificial em que trabalhava e que permite modelar qualquer tipo de rosto. Dá então início à sua vingança.

programme.title: Jack e Jill
programme.desc: Jack é um publicitário de sucesso em L.A., com uma bela esposa e filhos, que receia todos os anos o mesmo evento: a visita da irmã gémea no dia de Ação de Graças. A necessitada e passivo-agressiva Jill enlouquece Jack, virando a sua vida do avesso.

Em 1946, Branch Rickey, dono dos Brooklin Dodgers, fez uma das jogadas mais arriscadas na Liga de Basebol Americana, ao contratar para a sua equipa Jackie Robinson. O contrato arrastou ambos para um mundo de críticas vindas do público, da imprensa e até mesmo dos outros jogadores.

programme.title: Olha Quem Fala Agora!
programme.desc: Em casa dos Ubriacco vivem-se dias agitados. James trabalha como piloto privado de uma multimilionária e Mollie tenta conciliar os deveres de mãe com um novo trabalho. Quando James adota um rafeiro e a patroa deste deixa a sua cadela sofisticada aos cuidados da família, as confusões sucedem-se.

programme.title: Sete Anos no Tibete
programme.desc: Heinrich Harrer, um alpinista austríaco, tenta, em 1939, subir os Himalaias e trava conhecimento com o jovem Dalai Lama. Ele e o seu companheiro Peter são os únicos dois estrangeiros a pisar a cidade sagrada de Lhasa. Esta viagem leva-os a testemunhar um momento marcante da história do Tibete.

programme.title: 8mm
programme.desc: Quando o detetive privado Tom Wells descobre um pequeno filme de 8 mm, a sua vivência tranquila acaba, e é encarregue de descobrir se é autêntico ou não. À medida que se embrenha na investigação, fica cada vez mais obcecado, provocando o afastamento progressivo da sua família e dos que o rodeiam.

programme.title: Cidade Dividida
programme.desc: Desconfiado de que a sua esposa lhe é infiel, Nicholas Hostetler, o popular presidente da Câmara de Nova Iorque, decide recorrer aos serviços de Billy Taggart, um ex-polícia caído em desgraça e que agora ganha a vida como detetive particular.

programme.title: Impune
programme.desc: Um jovem polícia é enviado para uma esquadra num bairro de classe média, onde cresceu. No entanto, um velho segredo ameaça vir à superfície e, consequentemente, destruir a sua vida e a sua família.

programme.title: Ex_Machina
programme.desc: Caleb, um jovem programador da maior empresa de Internet do mundo, participa numa experiência estranha e fascinante. Ele deverá interagir com a primeira inteligência artificial do mundo, incorporada no corpo de uma bonita rapariga robótica.

programme.title: O Espião Fantasma
programme.desc: O ex-agente da CIA Paul Shepherdson é obrigado a sair da reforma, a fim de desvendar o misterioso homicídio de um senador. Tudo aponta para que o culpado seja um lendário agente russo, que Paul perseguiu durante toda a carreira. Contudo, o ex-agente defende que Cassius 7 já tinha sido eliminado.

programme.title: Os Irmãos Sisters
programme.desc: No velho oeste, dois irmãos, Charlie e Eli Sisters, são contratados para matar um prospetor de ouro. Começa assim uma implacável caçada, mas também uma jornada que irá testar os laços entre os dois irmãos.

programme.title: Duas Contra o Tempo
programme.desc: Julie, recém-divorciada e mãe de dois filhos adolescentes, luta para manter a família unida. Quando o seu ex-marido não pode mais ajudá-la financeiramente, tudo se torna mais complicado.

programme.title: Outlander

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter","dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Encontro de Morte
programme.desc: Uma aplicação de encontros é capaz de matar. Quando Hailey começa a investigar o homicídio, suspeita que o crime tenha tido origem numa crítica negativa, mas mais tarde percebe que alguém anda a matar por outra razão.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: 2 + 2 = Homicídio
programme.desc: A sobrinha de Hailey diz-lhe que a sua professora de música, a força motriz por trás da recolha de fundos para as obras na escola, queria falar com ela no papel de ex-procuradora. Como a professora desaparece, Hailey investiga e encontra sangue. A Polícia interroga todos os professores.

programme.title: Sou Sexy, Eu Sei!
programme.desc: Renee Bennett é uma mulher insegura que, após acordar de uma queda, passa a acreditar que é a mulher mais bela e capaz do mundo. Cheia de autoconfiança, ela ganha o poder para viver a vida sem medos.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Mieux Vaut L'Abondance Que Le Besoin
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

programme.title: Onde Reside o Amor
programme.desc: Finn, uma estudante universitária, vai passar o verão à Califórnia, na casa onde vive a sua avó e a sua tia. Tem de acabar a sua tese de doutoramento e refletir sobre uma importante decisão: se vai aceitar o pedido de casamento de Sam, o seu namorado.

programme.title: Magia e Sedução
programme.desc: Sally e Gillian Owens são duas irmãs descendentes de uma família de bruxas que carrega uma maldição centenária. Agora, têm de enfrentar vários feitiços inesperados e ultrapassar todos os obstáculos para encontrarem o verdadeiro amor.

programme.title: Nos Meus Sonhos
programme.desc: Natalie e Nick são dois solitários, frustrados com a sua falta de sorte no amor. Depois de atirarem uma moeda para uma fonte, começam a sonhar um com o outro e em sonhos apaixonam-se. Mas como é que encontramos – na vida real - a pessoa com quem sonhamos?

programme.title: Outlander
Outlander
programme.desc: Outlander: Created by Ronald D. Moore. With Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Sophie Skelton. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Mieux Vaut L'Abondance Que Le Besoin
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: 2 + 2 = Homicídio
programme.desc: A sobrinha de Hailey diz-lhe que a sua professora de música, a força motriz por trás da recolha de fundos para as obras na escola, queria falar com ela no papel de ex-procuradora. Como a professora desaparece, Hailey investiga e encontra sangue. A Polícia interroga todos os professores.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Casados para Matar
programme.desc: Quando um negociante de arte é encontrado morto, Hailey Dean junta-se aos amigos – os detetives Danny Morgan, Fincher Garland e Charlene "Monty" Montgomery – para investigar. Hailey começa com uma visita à galeria com Clyde, um amigo da universidade que reencontrou recentemente.

programme.title: Mulheres!
programme.desc: Mary é uma mulher moderna, casada com Stephen, um homem de negócios nova-iorquino. Fiel ao marido e mãe de uma filha, está rodeada das suas "amigas". Mas elas sabem uma coisa que ela ignora: O marido anda a traí-la com Crystal Allen.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Qui Se Repent Se Punit Soi-Même
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: O Sorriso de Mona Lisa
programme.desc: Em 1953, uma professora de História da Arte num colégio para raparigas tenta alargar os estreitos horizontes das suas brilhantes alunas. O maior desafio será fazer com que as estudantes encontrem (e assumam) a sua identidade cultural, partindo da visão ampla e desafiante dos novos conhecimentos.

programme.title: Querida Eleanor
programme.desc: Em 1962, durante o caos da crise dos mísseis em Cuba, duas adolescentes viajam através dos Estados Unidos em busca de Eleanor Roosevelt.

programme.title: A Lagoa Azul: O Despertar
programme.desc: Neste remake do clássico de 1980, dois adolescentes são vítimas de um naufrágio e ficam presos numa ilha tropical, a meio de uma viagem com outros colegas do liceu. Sem a intervenção de adultos, crescem apenas um com o outro.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: Red e Mandy levam uma vida tranquila numa cabana isolada junto a um lago do Colorado. Um dia, a sua casa é invadida por membros de uma seita religiosa que matam Mandy e deixam Red à beira da morte. Traumatizado, apenas uma coisa o mantém preso à vida: um intenso desejo de punir os responsáveis.

programme.title: Dia de Fúria
programme.desc: Na Espanha do século XVI, o agente da lei Ruy de Mendoza investiga uma série de crimes bizarros e misteriosos, mas quando vê que se levantam muitos obstáculos ao seu trabalho, percebe que há uma teia maior de interesses por trás de tudo.

programme.title: Paydirt
programme.desc: Um indivíduo em liberdade condicional junta-se à sua antiga equipa, que está determinada a encontrar um saco enterrado de dinheiro roubado há uma década, proveniente de uma rusga da DEA que correu mal. Ao mesmo tempo, é perseguido por um xerife reformado.

programme.title: As Invisíveis
programme.desc: Depois de uma decisão municipal para encerrar um abrigo, as assistentes sociais têm apenas três meses para reintegrarem a qualquer preço as mulheres que ajudam: falsificações, enganos, mentiras... De agora em diante, tudo é permitido!

programme.title: A Mulher
programme.desc: Uma mulher questiona as suas escolhas de vida, durante uma viagem que faz com o marido até Estocolmo, onde ele irá receber o Prémio Nobel da Literatura.

programme.title: Ao Ritmo da Paixão
programme.desc: Uma jovem americana que sonha ser bailarina profissional viaja para a Índia com a família para um casamento que dura toda a semana. Aí ela apaixona-se por um novo estilo de dança e por um deslumbrante bailarino indiano.

programme.title: Extremamente Perverso, Escandalosamente Cruel e Vil
programme.desc: A histórica verídica de Ted Bundy, o assassino em série mais famoso dos EUA. Bonito, inteligente e carismático, Ted vive uma vida aparentemente perfeita com Liz. Mas quando Ted é acusado de uma série de assassinatos tenebrosos, Liz tem de reavaliar tudo.

programme.title: Showtime
programme.desc: Um polícia branco e um polícia negro são obrigados a participar no programa 'Showtime' para melhorar a imgem da autoridade.

programme.title: Outcast - O Último Templário
programme.desc: Gallain, um guerreiro misterioso, junta-se aos filhos de um imperador chinês deposto para destronar o seu irmão cruel, que procura vê-los mortos. Jacob, que enfrenta os seus próprios "fantasmas", também se junta a eles, procurando salvar o reino e colocar o príncipe no trono.

programme.title: Era Uma Vez No México
programme.desc: Sands é um peculiar agente da CIA destinado no México. Segundo ele, a sua missão é manter o equilíbrio no país. Quando descobre que Barillo planeia assassinar o Presidente através do general Marquez, vai em busca do legendário El Mariachi, que vive isolado, para que este acabe com ele.

programme.title: Dead Trigger
programme.desc: Um misterioso vírus matou milhões de pessoas e transformou muitas outras em zombies sedentos de sangue... Incapaz de deter o vírus, o governo recruta jovens para formar um pelotão de elite: Dead Trigger.

programme.title: FicaEmCasa
programme.desc: Dois anos após o início da pandemia de Covid-19, um grupo de amigos faz uma festa online cheia de jogos, bebida e droga. Depois de tomarem ecstasy, as coisas começam a correr mal e as suas casas tornam-se muito mais aterrorizantes do que o mundo lá fora...

programme.title: Estranhas Revelações
programme.desc: Um jornalista especializado em assassinatos violentos descobre o corpo mutilado da sua nova namorada e encontra um diário que revela as futuras vítimas do assassino em série. Hicks decide antecipar o assassino e evitar mais mortes antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: A Lenda de Golem
programme.desc: No século XVII, durante uma pandemia mortífera, uma mística tenta salvar a sua comunidade judia isolada dos invasores, mas a entidade que ela invoca para a proteger acaba por tornar-se um mal ainda maior.

programme.title: Operação Gerónimo: A Caça a Bin Laden
programme.desc: Quando surgem rumores sobre a localização de Osama bin Laden, a CIA prepara uma equipa SEAL de elite. Apesar das evidências inconclusivas de que Osama está dentro da casa em questão, e ignorando as possíveis ramificações de um ataque surpresa em solo paquistanês, o Pentágono decide ordenar o ataque.

programme.title: Masaan
programme.desc: Quatro vidas cruzam-se no rio Ganges: um rapaz de uma casta mais baixa perdido de amores, uma filha que se sente culpada pelo seu encontro sexual que acaba em tragédia, um pai infeliz com uma moral duvidosa e um rapaz que apenas procura uma família.

programme.title: A Morte de Estaline
programme.desc: Uma sátira sobre o panorama político interno da Rússia Soviética, nos anos 50, após a morte de Estaline. Nos dias imediatamente a seguir, os membros do comité do Partido Comunista, outrora fiéis seguidores do ditador, revelam a sua sede de poder...

programme.title: Diários de Che Guevara
programme.desc: Ernesto Che Guevara e o seu amigo Alberto Granado partem para uma viagem de 8000 quilómetros numa velha moto, carinhosamente apelidada de "La Poderosa". Che era, em 1952, um jovem de classe social abastada a um passo de terminar o curso de medicina, mas a realidade da América Latina muda a sua vida.

programme.title: Linda de Morrer
programme.desc: Na pequena cidade americana de Mount Rose, o muito aguardado concurso anual de beleza começa a gerar as maiores suspeitas quando várias concorrentes vão morrendo de forma misteriosa e se torna claro que há alguém a querer vencer a qualquer custo.

programme.title: Perfil de Sonho
programme.desc: Kyle Moore, um adolescente incapaz de adaptar-se à nova cidade natal após o divórcio dos pais, depara-se com uma App mágica que faz com que as suas publicações nas redes sociais se tornem realidade, fazendo com que tenha um perfil de sonho.

programme.title: De Repente, Já nos 30!
programme.desc: Jenna, de 13 anos, sente-se sufocada pelos pais, ignorada pelos colegas e, no dia do seu aniversário, é trancada dentro de um armário. Aí, ela deseja ser adulta e ter a vida com que sempre sonhou. Quando sai do armário, o seu desejo foi realizado. Mas Jenna sente a falta de Matt, o seu único amigo.

programme.title: Uma Casa Cheia
programme.desc: Alice Kinney decide começar uma nova vida com as duas filhas em Los Angeles. Tudo parece estar a entrar nos eixos até ela conhecer Teddy, Zoey e Harry, que precisam de um lugar para morar. Alice concorda em dar-lhes guarida, nunca imaginando que, contra todas as probabilidades, acabaria apaixonada.

programme.title: O Professor Chanfrado
programme.desc: O professor de genética Sherman Klump tem excesso de peso e, desesperado para conquistar a bela Carla, bebe um soro experimental para emagrecer. Sherman transforma-se em "Buddy Love", um conversador, energético e esbelto Don Juan!

programme.title: R.I.P.D.: Agentes do Outro Mundo
programme.desc: Nick, um jovem agente, é assassinado durante um tiroteio. Chegado ao "outro lado", é notificado que fará parte do R.I.P.D., o departamento responsável pela captura de demónios que habitam o mundo dos vivos. Forma equipa com Roy, um xerife falecido há mais de 100 anos que não teme nada nem ninguém.

programme.title: Wallace e Gromit: A Maldição do Coelhomem (V.O.)
programme.desc: A poucos dias do Concurso Anual de Vegetais Gigantes, Wallace e o seu leal cão Gromit tentam descobrir a misteriosa criatura devoradora de legumes que está a colocar a competição em risco.

programme.title: Eles Vivem
programme.desc: Um solitário desempregado descobre que a sociedade está a ser dominada por uma raça superior de alienígenas, que se disfarçam de seres humanos. Como tal, vai juntar-se a uma organização que quer destruir os extraterrestres, mas estes só podem ser vistos com uns óculos de sol especiais.

programme.title: Instinto Predador
programme.desc: Um navio transporta animais perigosos da Amazónia, incluindo um raro jaguar branco. No mesmo navio um assassino, extraditado em segredo para os EUA, consegue escapar e libertar todos os animais em cativeiro, deixando os tripulantes em perigo de vida.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc:
FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"altereggo123"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wow. Shocking how bad this is. So disappointing!","reviewBody":"I expect a certain amount of political correctness from a Dick Wolf show. In Law & Order, it was common for the initial suspect--a low level hood from the ghetto--to be innocent, with the ultimate criminal turning out to be a wealthy white executive/headmaster/philanthropist/politician/stereotypical elitist. By now, I expect any crime show on any network in the US and the UK to have ethnically diverse investigators reporting to a female commander. But as long as the plots make sense and the serious dialogue is leavened with humor, I can put up with all the calibrated political correctness. I've watched a lot of these shows over the years, notwithstanding their occasional triteness.

This show is PC on steroids. It's is the first show I've ever seen in which MS-13 members are victims. There is a point where the political messaging just gets so tiresome and tendentious that it results in ridiculous plots, terrible dialogue, and total inauthenticity.

I hoped this show would be entertaining even if it wasn't exactly Masterpiece-just ordinary, decent TV. Instead. it is so stupid that it's unwatchable. How could a show with its pedigree go so wrong?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13074,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

In Law & Order, it was common for the initial suspect--a low level hood from the ghetto--to be innocent, with the ultimate criminal turning out to be a wealthy white executive/headmaster/philanthropist/politician/stereotypical elitist. By now, I expect any crime show on any network in the US and the UK to have ethnically diverse investigators reporting to a female commander. But as long as the plots make sense and the serious dialogue is leavened with humor, I can put up with all the calibrated political correctness. I've watched a lot of these shows over the years, notwithstanding their occasional triteness.

This show is PC on steroids. It's is the first show I've ever seen in which MS-13 members are victims. There is a point where the political messaging just gets so tiresome and tendentious that it results in ridiculous plots, terrible dialogue, and total inauthenticity.

I hoped this show would be entertaining even if it wasn't exactly Masterpiece-just ordinary, decent TV. Instead. it is so stupid that it's unwatchable. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"altereggo123","dateCreated":"2018-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wow. Shocking how bad this is. So disappointing!","reviewBody":"I expect a certain amount of political correctness from a Dick Wolf show. In Law & Order, it was common for the initial suspect--a low level hood from the ghetto--to be innocent, with the ultimate criminal turning out to be a wealthy white executive/headmaster/philanthropist/politician/stereotypical elitist. By now, I expect any crime show on any network in the US and the UK to have ethnically diverse investigators reporting to a female commander. But as long as the plots make sense and the serious dialogue is leavened with humor, I can put up with all the calibrated political correctness. I've watched a lot of these shows over the years, notwithstanding their occasional triteness.

This show is PC on steroids. It's is the first show I've ever seen in which MS-13 members are victims. There is a point where the political messaging just gets so tiresome and tendentious that it results in ridiculous plots, terrible dialogue, and total inauthenticity.

I hoped this show would be entertaining even if it wasn't exactly Masterpiece-just ordinary, decent TV. Instead. it is so stupid that it's unwatchable. How could a show with its pedigree go so wrong?","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13074,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund
